00049 CAMdataHandler::CAMdataHandler()
00050

00052 
00053     dataType        = 0;
00054 
00055     dataPointer     = 0;
00056 
00057     dataSize        = 0;
00058

00066 
00067 CAMdataHandler::CAMdataHandler( const CAMdataHandler& A)
00068 
00069 {
00070 
00071     if(A.temporaryFlag == 1)
00072 
00073     {
00074 
00075         dataType        = A.dataType;
00076 
00077         dataSize        = A.dataSize;
00078 
00079         dataPointer     = A.dataPointer;
00080 
00081         temporaryFlag   = 0;
00082 
00083         referenceCount  = 0;
00084 
00085 
00086 
00087     }
00088 
00089     else
00090 
00091     {
00092 
00093         allocateData(A.dataSize,A.dataType);
00094 
00095         setTypeFlag(A.dataType);
00096 
00097         copyData(A.dataSize,A.dataPointer);
00098 
00099         temporaryFlag   = 0;
00100 
00101         referenceCount  = 0;
00102 
00103     }
00104 
00105 }

00112 
00113         allocateData(size,dType);
00114 
00115         setTypeFlag(dType);
00116 
00117         temporaryFlag   = 0;
00118 
00119         referenceCount  = 0;

00121 }

00151 ostream&  operator <<(ostream& out_stream, const CAMdataHandler& A)
00152 
00153 {
00154 
00155 
00156 
00157 #ifndef __NO_COMPLEX__
00158 
00159     complex* cdataP;
00160 
00161 #endif
00162 
00163 
00164 
00165     long i;
00166 
00167 
00168 
00169     switch(A.dataType)
00170 
00171     {
00172 
00173     case  CAMType::typeInt :
00174 
00175     int i_out;
00176 
00177     for(i = 0; i < A.dataSize; i++)
00178 
00179     {A.getDataValue(i, i_out); out_stream  << i_out << " ";}
00180 
00181     out_stream  << endl;
00182 
00183     break;
00184 
00185 
00186 
00187     case  CAMType::typeLong :
00188 
00189     long l_out;
00190 
00191     for(i = 0; i < A.dataSize; i++)
00192 
00193     {A.getDataValue(i, l_out); out_stream  << l_out << " ";}
00194 
00195     out_stream << endl;
00196 
00197     break;
00198 
00199 
00200 
00201     case  CAMType::typeFloat :
00202 
00203     float f_out;
00204 
00205     for(i = 0; i < A.dataSize; i++)
00206 
00207     {A.getDataValue(i, f_out); out_stream  << f_out << " ";}
00208 
00209     out_stream << endl;
00210 
00211     break;
00212 
00213 
00214 
00215     case  CAMType::typeDouble :
00216 
00217     double d_out;
00218 
00219     for(i = 0; i < A.dataSize; i++)
00220 
00221     {A.getDataValue(i, d_out); out_stream  << d_out << " ";}
00222 
00223     out_stream << endl;
00224 
00225     break;
00226 
00227 
00228 
00229 #ifndef __NO_COMPLEX__
00230 
00231     case  CAMType::typeComplex :
00232 
00233     cdataP = (complex*)A.dataPointer;
00234 
00235     for(i = 0; i < A.dataSize; i++)
00236 
00237     out_stream << *(cdataP + i) << " ";
00238 
00239     out_stream << endl;
00240 
00241     break;
00242 
00243 #endif
00244 
00245 
00246 
00247     }
00248 
00249     return(out_stream);
00250 
00251 
00252 
00253 }

00265 CAMdataHandler&  CAMdataHandler::operator =( const CAMdataHandler& A)
00266 
00267 {
00268 
00269     if(A.temporaryFlag == 1)
00270 
00271     {
00272 
00273         dataType        = A.dataType;
00274 
00275         dataSize        = A.dataSize;
00276 
00277         dataPointer     = A.dataPointer;
00278 
00279         temporaryFlag   = 0;
00280 
00281         referenceCount  = 0;
00282 
00283     }
00284 
00285     else
00286 
00287     {
00288 
00289         destroyData();
00290 
00291         allocateData(A.dataSize,A.dataType);
00292 
00293         setTypeFlag(A.dataType);
00294 
00295         copyData(A.dataSize,A.dataPointer);
00296 
00297         temporaryFlag   = 0;
00298 
00299         referenceCount  = 0;
00300 
00301     }
00302 
00303     return *this;
00304 
00305 }

00399 void  CAMdataHandler::setTypeFlag(int dType)
00400 
00401 {
00402 
00403 
00404 
00405     switch(dType)
00406 
00407     {
00408 
00409     case CAMType::typeInt :
00410

00412

00414 
00415     break;
00416 
00417 
00418 
00419     case CAMType::typeLong :
00420 
00421 
00422

00424 
00425     break;
00426 
00427 
00428 
00429     case CAMType::typeFloat :
00430

00434

00437 
00438 
00439     case CAMType::typeDouble :
00440

00447 
00448 
00449 #ifndef __NO_COMPLEX__
00450 
00451     case CAMType::typeComplex :
00452 
00453     dataType        = CAMType::typeComplex;
00454

00457 #endif
00458 
00459     }

00467 void  CAMdataHandler::allocateData(long size, int dType)
00468 
00469 {
00470 
00471 
00472 
00473     switch(dType)
00474 
00475     {
00476 
00477     case CAMType::typeInt :
00478 
00479     dataSize        = size;
00480 
00481     dataPointer     = new int[size];
00482 
00483     break;
00484 
00485 
00486 
00487     case CAMType::typeLong :
00488 
00489     dataSize        = size;
00490 
00491     dataPointer     = new long[size];
00492 
00493     break;
00494 
00495 
00496 
00497     case CAMType::typeFloat :
00498 
00499     dataSize        = size;
00500 
00501     dataPointer     = new float[size];
00502 
00503     break;
00504 
00505 
00506 
00507     case CAMType::typeDouble :
00508 
00509     dataSize        = size;
00510 
00511     dataPointer     = new double[size];
00512 
00513     break;
00514 
00515 
00516 
00517 #ifndef __NO_COMPLEX__
00518 
00519     case CAMType::typeComplex :
00520 
00521     dataSize        = size;
00522 
00523     dataPointer     = new complex[size];
00524 
00525     break;
00526 
00527 #endif
00528 
00529     }
00530 
00531 //
00532 
00533 //  initialize with zero's
00534 
00535 //
00536 
00537 #ifndef __NO_BLAS__
00538 
00539     int    izero    = 0;
00540 
00541     long   lzero    = 0;
00542 
00543     float  fzero    = 0.0;
00544 
00545     double dzero    = 0.0;
00546 
00547     long   strideX = 0;
00548 
00549     long   strideY = 1;
00550 
00551 #endif
00552 
00553 
00554 
00555     switch(dType)
00556 
00557     {
00558 
00559     case  CAMType::typeInt :
00560 
00561     register int* idataP;
00562 
00563 #ifdef __NO_BLAS__
00564 
00565     for(idataP = (int*)dataPointer; idataP < (int*)dataPointer + size; idataP++)
00566 
00567      *(idataP) = 0;
00568 
00569 #else
00570 
00571     idataP = (int*)dataPointer;
00572 
00573     icopy_(&size,&izero,&strideX, idataP, &strideY);
00574 
00575 #endif
00576 
00577     break;
00578 
00579 
00580 
00581     case  CAMType::typeLong :
00582 
00583     register long* ldataP;
00584 
00585 #ifdef __NO_BLAS__
00586 
00587     for(ldataP = (long*)dataPointer; ldataP < (long*)dataPointer + size; ldataP++)
00588 
00589      *(ldataP) = 0;
00590 
00591 #else
00592 
00593     ldataP = (long*)dataPointer;
00594 
00595     lcopy_(&size,&lzero,&strideX, ldataP, &strideY);
00596 
00597 #endif
00598 
00599     break;
00600 
00601 
00602 
00603     case  CAMType::typeFloat :
00604 
00605     register  float* fdataP;
00606 
00607 #ifdef __NO_BLAS__
00608 
00609     for(fdataP = (float*)dataPointer; fdataP < (float*)dataPointer + size; fdataP++)
00610 
00611      *(fdataP) = 0.0;
00612 
00613 #else
00614 
00615     fdataP = (float*)dataPointer;
00616 
00617     scopy_(&size,&fzero,&strideX, fdataP, &strideY);
00618 
00619 #endif
00620 
00621     break;
00622 
00623 
00624 
00625     case  CAMType::typeDouble :
00626 
00627     register double* ddataP;
00628 
00629 #ifdef __NO_BLAS__
00630 
00631     for(ddataP = (double*)dataPointer; ddataP < (double*)dataPointer + size; ddataP++)
00632 
00633      *(ddataP) = 0.0;
00634 
00635 #else
00636 
00637     ddataP = (double*)dataPointer;
00638 
00639     dcopy_(&size,&dzero,&strideX, ddataP, &strideY);
00640 
00641 #endif
00642 
00643 
00644 
00645     break;
00646 
00647 
00648 
00649 #ifndef __NO_COMPLEX__
00650 
00651     case  CAMType::typeComplex :
00652 
00653     complex* cdataP;
00654 
00655     for(cdataP = (complex*)dataPointer; cdataP < (complex*)dataPointer + size; cdataP++)
00656 
00657     *(cdataP) = complex(0.0,0.0);
00658 
00659     break;
00660 
00661 #endif
00662 
00663 
00664 
00665     }
00666

00670 
00671 void  CAMdataHandler::copyData(long Size, void* dataP)
00672 
00673 {
00674 
00675 #ifndef __NO_BLAS__
00676 
00677     long strideX = 1;
00678 
00679     long strideY = 1;
00680 
00681 #endif
00682 
00683 
00684 
00685     switch(dataType)
00686 
00687     {
00688 
00689     case  CAMType::typeInt :
00690 
00691     register int* idataP; register  int* inIdataP;
00692 
00693 #ifdef __NO_BLAS__
00694 
00695     for(idataP = (int*)dataPointer, inIdataP = (int*)dataP;
00696 
00697     idataP < (int*)dataPointer + Size; idataP++, inIdataP++)
00698 
00699     *(idataP) = *(inIdataP);
00700 
00701 #else
00702 
00703     idataP   = (int*)dataPointer;
00704 
00705     inIdataP = (int*)dataP;
00706 
00707     icopy_(&Size,inIdataP,&strideX, idataP, &strideY);
00708 
00709 #endif
00710 
00711 
00712 
00713     break;
00714 
00715 
00716 
00717     case  CAMType::typeLong :
00718 
00719     register long* ldataP; register  long* inLdataP;
00720 
00721 #ifdef __NO_BLAS__
00722 
00723     for(ldataP = (long*)dataPointer, inLdataP = (long*)dataP;
00724 
00725     ldataP < (long*)dataPointer + Size; ldataP++, inLdataP++)
00726 
00727     *(ldataP) = *(inLdataP);
00728 
00729 #else
00730 
00731     ldataP   = (long*)dataPointer;
00732 
00733     inLdataP = (long*)dataP;
00734 
00735     lcopy_(&Size,inLdataP,&strideX, ldataP, &strideY);
00736 
00737 #endif
00738 
00739 
00740 
00741     break;
00742 
00743 
00744 
00745     case  CAMType::typeFloat :
00746 
00747     register float* fdataP;  register float*  inFdataP;
00748 
00749 #ifdef __NO_BLAS__
00750 
00751     for(fdataP = (float*)dataPointer, inFdataP = (float*)dataP;
00752 
00753     fdataP < (float*)dataPointer + Size; fdataP++, inFdataP++)
00754 
00755     *(fdataP) = *(inFdataP);
00756 
00757 #else
00758 
00759     fdataP = (float*)dataPointer;
00760 
00761     inFdataP = (float*)dataP;
00762 
00763     scopy_(&Size,inFdataP,&strideX, fdataP, &strideY);
00764 
00765 #endif
00766 
00767 
00768 
00769     break;
00770 
00771 
00772 
00773     case  CAMType::typeDouble :
00774 
00775     register double* ddataP;  register double* inDdataP;
00776 
00777 #ifdef __NO_BLAS__
00778 
00779     for(ddataP = (double*)dataPointer, inDdataP = (double*)dataP;
00780 
00781     ddataP < (double*)dataPointer + Size; ddataP++, inDdataP++)
00782 
00783      *(ddataP) = *(inDdataP);
00784 
00785 #else
00786 
00787     ddataP   = (double*)dataPointer;
00788 
00789     inDdataP = (double*)dataP;
00790 
00791     dcopy_(&Size,inDdataP,&strideX, ddataP, &strideY);
00792 
00793 #endif
00794 
00795 
00796 
00797     break;
00798 
00799 
00800 
00801 #ifndef __NO_COMPLEX__
00802 
00803     case  CAMType::typeComplex :
00804 
00805     complex* cdataP;  complex* inCdataP;
00806 
00807     for(cdataP = (complex*)dataPointer, inCdataP = (complex*)dataP;
00808 
00809     cdataP < (complex*)dataPointer + Size; cdataP++, inCdataP++)
00810 
00811      *(cdataP) = *(inCdataP);
00812 
00813     break;
00814 
00815 #endif
00816 
00817 
00818 
00819     }
00820 
00821 }

00824 
00825 void  CAMdataHandler::destroyData()
00826 
00827 {
00828 
00829     if(dataType != 0)
00830 
00831     {
00832 
00833     switch(dataType)
00834 
00835     {
00836 
00837     case  CAMType::typeInt :
00838 
00839     int* idataP;
00840 
00841     idataP = (int*)dataPointer;
00842 
00843     if(idataP != 0) delete [] idataP;
00844 
00845     break;
00846 
00847 
00848 
00849     case  CAMType::typeLong :
00850 
00851     long* ldataP;
00852 
00853     ldataP = (long*)dataPointer;
00854 
00855     if(ldataP != 0) delete [] ldataP;
00856 
00857     break;
00858 
00859 
00860 
00861     case  CAMType::typeFloat :
00862 
00863     float* fdataP;
00864 
00865     fdataP = (float*)dataPointer;
00866 
00867     if(fdataP != 0) delete [] fdataP;
00868 
00869     break;
00870 
00871 
00872 
00873     case  CAMType::typeDouble :
00874 
00875     double* ddataP;
00876 
00877     ddataP = (double*)dataPointer;
00878 
00879     if(ddataP != 0) delete [] ddataP;
00880 
00881     break;
00882 
00883 
00884 
00885 #ifndef __NO_COMPLEX__
00886 
00887     case  CAMType::typeComplex :
00888 
00889     complex* cdataP;
00890 
00891     cdataP = (complex*)dataPointer;
00892 
00893     if(cdataP != 0) delete [] cdataP;
00894 
00895     break;
00896 
00897 #endif
00898 
00899     }
00900 
00901 
00902 
00903     }
00904 
00905 }

00918 
00919 void  CAMdataHandler::incrementReferenceCount()
00920 
00921 {
00922 
00923     if(referenceCount == 0) CAMdataHandler::referenceCountError();
00924 
00925     referenceCount++;
00926 
00927 }
00928 
00929 
00930 
00931 void  CAMdataHandler::referenceCountError()
00932 
00933 {
00934 
00935 cerr << " Cannot Use Reference Counting on Objects New\'d by the Compiler " << endl;
00936 
00937 CAMmvaExit();
00938 
00939 }
